root.name: Grotesque Tactics 2: Dungeons and Donuts
root.description: OverviewThe sequel to the comedic turn based strategy RPG Grotesque Tactics: Evil Heroes.Composed of humorous dialogue-based puzzled and combat where all units are controlled simultaneously.StoryAfter the victory over the Dark Church, the Kingdom of Glory is consumed in a heavy fog. Those caught in the fog's grasp disappear into nothing. The remaining citizens lock themselves in the ancient catacombs in an attempt to stay alive. As food supplies diminish, the mercenary Knights of Glory and the High Elves form guilds to seek out additional supplies.PC System RequirementsOperating system: Windows® XP / Vista™ / Windows® 7Processor: Dual-Core 2.2 GHz CPUMemory: 2GBHard disk space: 1GBVideo:Direct X 9.0c compatible with shader model 2.0 (nVidia GeForce 5/FX/ATI Radeon 9500 Series/ATI X700 or better)Sound:Sound card with DirectX 9.0c supportDirectX®: DirectX® 9.0c
